name: createScreenScheme
description:
Creates a screen scheme.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

description.description: The description of the screen scheme. The maximum length is 255 characters.

name.description: The name of the screen scheme. The name must be unique. The maximum length is 255 characters.

screens.description: The IDs of the screens for the screen types of the screen scheme. Only screens used in classic projects are accepted.

ScreenTypes.description: The IDs of the screens for the screen types of the screen scheme.

create.description: The ID of the create screen.

default.description: The ID of the default screen. Required when creating a screen scheme.

edit.description: The ID of the edit screen.

view.description: The ID of the view screen.

$block: The ID of a screen scheme.

$ul: **id**: The ID of the screen scheme.
